sentences.sContent: Here in Menghai, the newly opened six-story emporium built to house hundreds of buyers and bundlers is a very lonely place.
sentences.sContent_eng: Here in Menghai, the newly opened six-story emporium built to house hundreds of buyers and bundlers is a very lonely place.
sentences.sCn: 现在的勐海，新开张的六层大百货商场十分冷清，它原本为数以百计的商家而建。

synos.tran: [贸易]商场，大百货商店；商业中心

trans.tranCn: 商场, 商业中心, 大百货商店
